tool.name: ADSFltInfotoSHP

param.name: _stp_Directory
param.dialogReference: Path to STP Directory. The location of the stp files. They are normally located in the following path: PROJECT_NAME\Imagery\ADS\XPRO\0PROJECT_NAME_sh27.xpro\session\20091002081134\raw
param.pythonReference: Path to STP Directory. The location of the stp files. They are normally located in the following path: PROJECT_NAME\Imagery\ADS\XPRO\PROJECT_NAME_sh#.xpro\session\20091002081134\raw

param.name: ADS_Shapefile
param.dialogReference: Path to the flight line shapefiles. Works on both the flight line centerline and flight line fooprint. They are normally located in the following path: PROJECT_NAME\Imagery\ADS\XPRO\PROJECT_NAME_sh#.xpro\session\20091002081134\Shapefiles
param.pythonReference: Path to the flight line shapefiles. Works on both the flight line centerline and flight line fooprint. They are normally located in the following path: PROJECT_NAME\Imagery\ADS\XPRO\PROJECT_NAME_sh#.xpro\session\20091002081134\Shapefiles

param.name: NadirBand
param.dialogReference: Band on the nadir band to use. The default is REDN00A. There is a dropdown containing the bands that are usually collected during missions: RGBN.
param.pythonReference: Band on the nadir band to use. The default is REDN00A. There is a dropdown containing the bands that are usually collected during missions: RGBN.

param.name: Output_Shapefile
param.dialogReference: Output location of the shapefile. Where the shapefile will be saved to.
param.pythonReference: Output location of the shapefile. Where the shapefile will be saved to.

param.name: Coordinate_System
param.dialogReference: Coordinate systems the shapefile will be saved in.
param.pythonReference: Coordinate systems the shapefile will be saved in.

tool.summary: Tool will mine the stp file created during rectification for flightline start, stop, and avg altitude during the flight. The information will then be added to the flight line shapefile also generated during rectification process. The tool works on all the ADS pushbroom digital sensors.
tool.usage: Tool will mine the stp file created during rectification for flightline start, stop, and avg altitude during the flight. The information will then be added to the flight line shapefile also generated during rectification process. The tool works on all the ADS pushbroom digital sensors.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: Tool will mine the stp file created during rectification for flightline start, stop, and avg altitude during the flight. The information will then be added to the flight line shapefile also generated during rectification process. The tool works on all the ADS pushbroom digital sensors.
